promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic mythical monkey psychic-type pokemon wearing ornate bracers. It can be found in castle-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or monkey. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Psychimpanzireign, a a gigantic mythical monkey psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in castle-like environments It has the following abilities: Unarmed, Creepy Wind. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "monkey", "psychic" or "Psychimpanzireign". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, monkey-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, violet shadows
generatedDescription: Living amongst towering fortresses, the colossal simian spectre, Psychimpanzireign, enchants the air with eerie gusts. It is armless, ruled by its mind.
